Text: This is a Media Sentry file. Don't Download!!!!
Sentry, Schmentry.  Use PeerBlock if you're worried about getting "the letter."  I have always used PeerBlock (PeerGuardian before that), and I've never gotten "the letter."

If you ever get "the letter" just ignore it.

They are phishing.  They go after the dipshits who freak out about getting a threatening letter and actually respond back.

They send out 10,000 letters.  They go after the idiots who respond.

Thanks for the insight, Phil.  I had never even thought of it that way, but it makes sense.  I have lots of friends who've gotten "the letter" (some, more than once) and they did nothing about it - and nothing happened.

Nonetheless, PeerBlock appears to be working, cuz I've never heard squat, even though I've DL'd torrents that were verified as "marked."
I shouldn't even bother replying but no, there is nothing but the unrared SCENE released mkv file in the torrent.
